channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Vitesse d’obturation en photo : tout comprendre pour maîtriser le mouvement
item.description: De tous les réglages photo, la vitesse d'obturation est celui qui a l'impact le plus créatif. Elle ne se contente pas de gérer la lumière : elle contrôle le temps. Une vitesse rapide fige une goutte d'eau en l'air ; une vitesse lente transforme les phares d'une voiture en rubans de lumière. C'est le réglage clé pour maîtriser le mouvement. On vous dit tout pour le comprendre et enfin le maîtriser. ...

item.title: How to watch Inoue vs Picasso: live stream boxing online, start time, ringwalks, fight card, PPV cost
item.description: All the ways to watch Inoue vs Picasso live streams online, including PPV options as the Monster defends his undisputed super bantamweight crown against El Rey.

item.title: Forget OpenVPN, WireGuard: This is the VPN protocol of the future
item.description: As censorship tactics and VPN blocking get ever more sophisticated, NordWhisper gets ready for when the classical VPN protocol won't be enough. NordVPN's CTO explains how.

item.title: Dreame's new cordless vacuum is nimble, powerful, and delivers the best edge cleaning I've seen
item.description: Throw away that Crevice tool – the V20 Pro has an ingenious way to get your room edges clean all on its own.

item.title: How to watch The Hunting Wives online for FREE from anywhere
item.description: Want to watch The Hunting Wives for FREE from anywhere? Stream every new twist as Sophie is drawn into betrayal, hidden agendas, and a fight to prove her innocence.

item.title: 3 questions for reviewing your year
item.description: A straightforward end-of-year exercise to cut through the December rush, identify your wins, and carry key lessons into the new year. For many of us, December rushes by in a blur of holiday merrymaking and gift-giving, end-of-year invoicing and accounting, and hasty planning for the year ahead. In the rush, the thoughtful year-end reflection we might have hoped for often doesn’t happen....
